dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Milliaria Germanica communia."
Shows historical regions of Macedonia, Epirus, and Achaia, in modern day Greece and Albania.
May have been intended for the author's Nuevo Atlas. En Amsterdam : A costa y en la casa de Juan Blaeu, 1659.
Spanish and Italian place names on map.
Appears in Blaeu's Theatrum orbis terrarum, sive atlas novus, Volume 3, Amsterdam, 1645, Dutch edition.
